member.name: M:ScreenshotService.Controllers.ScreenshotController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Get a file object containing the image.
member.param: Filename given when the screnshot was taken.

member.name: M:ScreenshotService.Controllers.ScreenshotController.Post(ScreenshotService.RequestModels.TakeSceenshotsPostRequest)
member.summary: Take screenshots for the given URLs.
member.param: An object containing a list of screenshot request objects. Each screenshot request object contains an url from where the screenshot is to be taken and a filename with which it is to be saved.
